title: Summons for the Soul - Novel Updates
author: Ppjj13y
description:
Three years ago, the sky over the imperial capital bloomed with ten thousand fireworks.
Three years ago, the waters of the River Li flowed sleepy and gentle.

Three years ago, three years ago, three years ago…

Now, the gates of the Imperial Palace remain wide open at night.
Now, the songs of soul summoning rise into the high heavens.

And so goes its words.

“O soul, come back ->
